content: the perfect faded tee playing with colors can be so much fun and for a summer tee i think a new faded tee is a knit wardrobe necessitiy faded frenzy is bright playful and perfect for the the warm weather knit with biscotte yarn in bis-sock makes this very light and next to skin comfort have fun and make the faded frenzy as bright and playful as you wish ======================================== **yarn** biscotte yarns - biscotte yarns bis-sock 400m / 435yds / 85% superwash merino wool and 15% nylon the sample is knit in colorways c1 hydrangea 1 1 1 2 2 2 skeins c2 limited edition #8080 1 1 1 2 2 2 skeins c3 cozy 1 1 1 2 2 2 skeins **needles** main fabric 3 75mm us#5 circulars of at least 75 cm 30 or size needed to obtain gauge ribbing 3 5mm us#4 circulars of at least 75 cm 30 **accessories** tapestry needle stitch holder or yarn of contrasting color stitch markers gauge 24 stitches and 33 row = 4 inches 10 cm in stockinette stitch **sizes** 34 36 38 40 42 44 **finished bust circumference** 36 38 40 42 44 46 inches **notes** this tee is knit top down starting with the back and then picking up stitches in the cast on edge of the back for the front which is worked flat to the arm holes the front and back are then joined to work in the round there is a little short row shaping for the neckline and for the hem after the tee is knit there is no need to pick up stitches for the neckline or the cuffs of the sleeve once bound off at the hem the tee is complete this tee is meant to be worn with 2 4 inches of positive ease la version française de ce patron se trouve sur leslainesbiscotte com 1 1 https //leslainesbiscotte com/products/chandail-faded-frenzy-tee-patron-de-tricot-gratuit
